item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 21, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Claude can now search the web (958 points | 514 comments)
2. The indieweb doesn't need to “take off” (155 points | 71 comments)
3. Not dropping RISC-V support after all, maybe (21 points | 12 comments)
4. Help Identify the Photographer Who Captured Many Images of 1960s San Francisco (36 points | 12 comments)
5. Calibre 8.0 Release (51 points | 13 comments)
6. Apple shuffles AI executive ranks in bid to turn around Siri (56 points | 57 comments)
7. Sync Engines Are the Future (76 points | 32 comments)
8. The head of South Korea's guard consulted ChatGPT before martial law was imposed (111 points | 64 comments)
9. Retro Boy: simple Game Boy emulator written in Rust, can be played on the web (200 points | 49 comments)
10. NASA Whoosh Rocket (65 points | 29 comments)
11. McLaren invented new carbon fiber tape to build even more complex parts (97 points | 63 comments)
12. The Frontend Treadmill (541 points | 529 comments)
13. Zero-knowledge proofs, encoding Sudoku and Mario speedruns without semantic leak (97 points | 15 comments)
14. History of Null Pointer Dereferences on macOS (34 points | 5 comments)
15. OpenAI Audio Models (516 points | 246 comments)
16. QRP Labs QMX SSB beta firmware relased (29 points | 5 comments)
17. SmolDocling: An ultra-compact VLM for end-to-end multi-modal document conversion (34 points | 6 comments)
18. Chibi: PNG-tuber application made in Rust (45 points | 30 comments)
19. Next generation LEDs are cheap and sustainable (114 points | 83 comments)
20. ACARS Drama (195 points | 87 comments)
21. The Burnout Machine (587 points | 439 comments)
22. Germany tightens travel advice to US after three citizens detained (71 points | 53 comments)
23. Build a Container Image from Scratch (127 points | 27 comments)
24. The Pain That Is GitHub Actions (623 points | 490 comments)
25. Human Perception of Dog Emotions Is Influenced by Extraneous Factors (4 points | 1 comment)
26. Understanding Solar Energy (210 points | 142 comments)
27. The Last Drops of Mexico City (185 points | 189 comments)
28. BCX Basic (8 points | discuss)
29. A New Form Factor for Drones: Vertical and Coaxial (13 points | 3 comments)
30. Oxygen discovered in most distant known galaxy (201 points | 153 comments)
